Title: Counting Bishops
Description:
Your task is to count the number of ways k bishops can be placed on an n \times n chessboard so that no two bishops attack each other. 
 Two bishops attack each other if they are on the same diagonal.
Input Specification: The only input line has two integers n and k: the board size and the number of bishops.
Output Specification: Print one integer: the number of ways modulo 10^9+7.
